alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:31PM AKST until January 17 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW DIMINISHING THIS EVENING THEN A SECOND ROUND OF SNOW LATE THIS WEEK... .Frontal band spreading north is bringing overrunning moisture over the colder air trapped in the Chilkat Valley and along the Haines Highway. Another storm system later this week will bring another round of snow for the northern Lynn Canal area. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches for the city of Haines with up to 11 inches possible out the road. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM AKST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Wednesday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
